name: Hero Image
editableFields: Hero Image: URL where image resides…relative path
Hero Image link URL: HREF URL to set the link as.  If null then image displays without a hyperlink…also included is _target field
Hero Image Target: Weather you want the link to open in a new window or not
Hero Image Alt Text: Alt text for the image
description: Display a single image with optional link. Image should be sized to 724px x 240px
